description.displayText: Jennifer provided in-home hospice (end of life) care to my Mother-in-law in September of 2016.  My MIL liked her a lot and Jen was always willing to do anything to ensure her comfort.  During the screening process, although she was not as experienced as some of the others, we could see that Jen would do well - she even brought a happy elderly client with her to the interview!  She was always enthusiastic about learning new methods for providing advanced hospice care and we were glad we picked her!
